RemoteDeploymentToken.title: Remote deployment token
RemoteDeploymentToken.description: A secret token for automatic sign-in to a specific tenant, with the email of the current browser profile or with an autogenerated anonymous email.

EndpointGeneratedId.title: Endpoint generated ID
EndpointGeneratedId.description: A random ID to identify the user/device after reinstallation.

IdpReferenceToken.title: IDP reference token
IdpReferenceToken.description: A secret token for identifying the SAML integration that should be used to sign-in.
